shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.
Holder's Steel-type attacks have 1.2x power.
Holder's attacks without a chance to flinch gain a 10% chance to flinch.
Holder's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.
The holder ignores rain- and sun-based effects.

desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be burned.
30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed.
30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned, paralyzed, or fall asleep.
30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned.
30% chance this Pokemon's ally has its non-volatile status condition cured at the end of each turn.
Active Pokemon without this Ability have their Attack multiplied by 0.75.
Active Pokemon without this Ability have their Defense multiplied by 0.75.
Active Pokemon without this Ability have their Special Attack multiplied by 0.75.
Active Pokemon without this Ability have their Special Defense multiplied by 0.75.

After another Pokemon uses a dance move, this Pokemon uses the same move. The copied move is subject to all effects that can prevent a move from being executed. A move used through this Ability cannot be copied again by other Pokemon with this Ability.
Combination of the Unnerve and Chilling Neigh Abilities.
Combination of the Unnerve and Grim Neigh Abilities.
Every move used by or against this Pokemon will always hit.
Grass-type Pokemon on this Pokemon's side cannot have their stat stages lowered by other Pokemon or have a non-volatile status condition inflicted on them by other Pokemon.

If Electric Terrain is active or this Pokemon uses a held Booster Energy, this Pokemon's highest stat is multiplied by 1.3, or by 1.5 if the highest stat is Speed. Stat stage changes are considered at the time this Ability activates. If multiple stats are tied, Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed are prioritized in that order. If this effect was started by Electric Terrain, a held Booster Energy will not activate and the effect ends when Electric Terrain is no longer active. If this effect was started by a held Booster Energy, it ends when this Pokemon is no longer active.
If Electric Terrain is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
If Grassy Terrain is active, this Pokemon's Defense is multiplied by 1.5.
If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon restores 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. This effect is prevented if this Pokemon is holding a Utility Umbrella.
If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled. This effect is prevented if this Pokemon is holding a Utility Umbrella.
If Sandstorm is active, the accuracy of moves used against this Pokemon is multiplied by 0.8. This Pokemon takes no damage from Sandstorm.
If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's Ground-, Rock-, and Steel-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.3. This Pokemon takes no damage from Sandstorm.
If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled. This Pokemon takes no damage from Sandstorm.
If Snow is active, the accuracy of moves used against this Pokemon is multiplied by 0.8.
If Snow is active, this Pokemon restores 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn.
If Snow is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

If Sunny Day is active or this Pokemon uses a held Booster Energy, this Pokemon's highest stat is multiplied by 1.3, or by 1.5 if the highest stat is Speed. Stat stage changes are considered at the time this Ability activates. If multiple stats are tied, Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed are prioritized in that order. If this effect was started by Sunny Day, a held Booster Energy will not activate and the effect ends when Sunny Day is no longer active. If this effect was started by a held Booster Energy, it ends when this Pokemon is no longer active.

If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon cannot become affected by a non-volatile status condition or Yawn, and Rest will fail for it. This effect is prevented if this Pokemon is holding a Utility Umbrella.

If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5 and it loses 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. These effects are prevented if the Pokemon is holding a Utility Umbrella.
If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled. This effect is prevented if this Pokemon is holding a Utility Umbrella.
If a Pokemon uses a Fire- or Ice-type attack against this Pokemon, that Pokemon's offensive stat is halved when calculating the damage to this Pokemon.
If a physical attack hits this Pokemon, its Defense is lowered by 1 stage and its Speed is raised by 2 stages.
If an active ally has this Ability or the Minus Ability, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5.
If an active ally has this Ability or the Plus Ability, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5.
If an ally uses its item, this Pokemon gives its item to that ally immediately. Does not activate if the ally's item was stolen or knocked off, or if the ally used an Eject Button or Eject Pack.
If another Pokemon burns, paralyzes, poisons, or badly poisons this Pokemon, that Pokemon receives the same non-volatile status condition.
If the last item this Pokemon used is a Berry, there is a 50% chance it gets restored at the end of each turn. If Sunny Day is active, this chance is 100%.
If this Pokemon eats a Berry, it will eat that Berry again at the end of the next turn.

If this Pokemon eats a held Berry, it restores 1/3 of its maximum HP, rounded down, in addition to the Berry's effect. This effect can also activate after the effects of Bug Bite, Fling, Pluck, Stuff Cheeks, and Teatime if the eaten Berry had an effect on this Pokemon.
If this Pokemon flinches, its Speed is raised by 1 stage.
If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Attack is multiplied by 1.5. This Pokemon's physical attacks ignore the burn effect of halving damage.
If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Defense is multiplied by 1.5.
If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Speed is multiplied by 1.5. This Pokemon ignores the paralysis effect of halving Speed.
If this Pokemon has a stat stage raised it is lowered instead, and vice versa.

If this Pokemon has no item and is hit by a contact move, it steals the attacker's item. This effect applies after all hits from a multi-hit move. This effect is prevented if the move had a secondary effect removed by the Sheer Force Ability.
If this Pokemon has no item, it finds one used by an adjacent Pokemon this turn.
If this Pokemon has no item, it steals the item off a Pokemon it hits with an attack. Does not affect Doom Desire and Future Sight.
If this Pokemon is a Greninja, its Attack, Special Attack, and Speed are raised by 1 stage if it attacks and knocks out another Pokemon. This effect can only happen once per battle.

If this Pokemon is a Mimikyu, the first hit it takes in battle deals 0 neutral damage. Its disguise is then broken, it changes to Busted Form, and it loses 1/8 of its max HP. Confusion damage also breaks the disguise.
If this Pokemon is a Palafin in Zero Form, switching out has it change to Hero Form.

If this Pokemon is a Tatsugiri and a Dondozo is an active ally, this Pokemon goes into the Dondozo's mouth. The Dondozo has its Attack, Special Attack, Speed, Defense, and Special Defense raised by 2 stages. During the effect, the Dondozo cannot be switched out, this Pokemon cannot select an action, and attacks targeted at this Pokemon will be avoided but it will still take indirect damage. If this Pokemon faints during the effect, a Pokemon can be switched in as a replacement but the Dondozo remains unable to be switched out. If the Dondozo faints during the effect, this Pokemon regains the ability to select an action.
If this Pokemon is an Arceus, its type changes to match its held Plate.

If this Pokemon is an Eiscue, the first physical hit it takes in battle deals 0 neutral damage. Its ice face is then broken and it changes forme to Noice Face. Eiscue regains its Ice Face forme when Snow begins or when Eiscue switches in while Snow is active. Confusion damage also breaks the ice face.
If this Pokemon is at full HP, damage taken from attacks is halved.
If this Pokemon is at full HP, it survives one hit with at least 1 HP. OHKO moves fail when used against this Pokemon.
If this Pokemon is at full HP, its Flying-type moves have their priority increased by 1.
If this Pokemon is hit by a physical attack, Toxic Spikes are set on the opposing side.
If this Pokemon is hit by an attack, there is a 30% chance that move gets disabled unless one of the attacker's moves is already disabled.
If this Pokemon is knocked out with a contact move, that move's user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down. If any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability, this effect is prevented.
If this Pokemon is poisoned, it restores 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn instead of losing HP.

If this Pokemon is the target of an opposing Pokemon's move, that move loses one additional PP. Imprison, Snatch, and Tera Blast also lose one additional PP when used by an opposing Pokemon, but Sticky Web does not.
If this Pokemon loses its held item for any reason, its Speed is doubled as long as it remains active, has this Ability, and is not holding an item.
If this Pokemon strikes with a critical hit, the damage is multiplied by 1.5.
If this Pokemon, but not its substitute, is struck by a critical hit, its Attack is raised by 12 stages.
No competitive use.
Non-damaging moves that check accuracy have their accuracy changed to 50% when used against this Pokemon. This effect comes before other effects that modify accuracy.
On switch-in, summons Electric Terrain. During Electric Terrain, Sp. Atk is 1.3333x.
On switch-in, summons Sunny Day. During Sunny Day, Attack is 1.3333x.
On switch-in, this Pokemon Transforms into the opposing Pokemon that is facing it. If there is no Pokemon at that position, this Pokemon does not Transform.

On switch-in, this Pokemon copies a random opposing Pokemon's Ability. Abilities that cannot be copied are As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Zen Mode, and Zero to Hero. If no opposing Pokemon has an Ability that can be copied, this Ability will activate as soon as one does.
On switch-in, this Pokemon copies all of its ally's stat stage changes.
On switch-in, this Pokemon identifies the held items of all opposing Pokemon.

On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted if any opposing Pokemon has an attack that is super effective against this Pokemon, or an OHKO move. This effect considers any move that deals direct damage as an attacking move of its respective type, Hidden Power counts as its determined type, and Judgment, Multi-Attack, Natural Gift, Revelation Dance, Techno Blast, and Weather Ball are considered Normal-type moves.

On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted to the move with the highest power, at random, known by an opposing Pokemon. This effect considers OHKO moves to have 150 power, Counter, Mirror Coat, and Metal Burst to have 120 power, every other attacking move with an unspecified power to have 80 power, and non-damaging moves to have 1 power.
On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of opposing Pokemon by 1 stage. Pokemon with the Inner Focus, Oblivious, Own Tempo, or Scrappy Abilities and Pokemon behind a substitute are immune.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Electric Terrain.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Grassy Terrain.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Psychic Terrain.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Rain Dance.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sandstorm.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Snow.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sunny Day.
On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.
On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage. Once per battle.
On switch-in, this Pokemon's Defense is raised by 1 stage. Once per battle.
On switch-in, this Pokemon's allies have their stat stages reset to 0.

Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability changed to Lingering Aroma. Does not affect Pokemon with the As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Lingering Aroma, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero Abilities.
Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Speed lowered by 1 stage.
Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down.
Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are airborne, are holding a Shed Shell, or are a Ghost type.
Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out, unless they are holding a Shed Shell, are a Ghost type, or also have this Ability.
Prevents opposing Steel-type Pokemon from choosing to switch out, unless they are holding a Shed Shell or are a Ghost type.
Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Attack stat stage.
Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Defense stat stage.
Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's accuracy stat stage. This Pokemon ignores a target's evasiveness stat stage.
Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.
Priority moves used by opposing Pokemon targeting this Pokemon or its allies are prevented from having an effect.
The power of Fire-type attacks against this Pokemon is halved. This Pokemon takes half of the usual burn damage, rounded down.
The power of this Pokemon's move is multiplied by 1.3 if it is the last to move in a turn. Does not affect Doom Desire and Future Sight.
There is a 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will become infatuated if it is of the opposite gender.
This Pokemon and its allies cannot become affected by Attract, Disable, Encore, Heal Block, Taunt, or Torment.

This Pokemon and its allies cannot fall asleep, but those already asleep do not wake up immediately. This Pokemon and its allies cannot use Rest successfully or become affected by Yawn, and those previously affected will not fall asleep.
This Pokemon and its allies' Steel-type moves have their power multiplied by 1.5. This affects Doom Desire even if the user is not on the field.
This Pokemon can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves. This Pokemon is immune to the effect of the Intimidate Ability.
This Pokemon can poison or badly poison a Pokemon regardless of its typing.
This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.
This Pokemon cannot be confused. Gaining this Ability while confused cures it. This Pokemon is immune to the effect of the Intimidate Ability.
This Pokemon cannot be frozen. Gaining this Ability while frozen cures it.
This Pokemon cannot be infatuated or taunted. Gaining this Ability while infatuated or taunted cures it. This Pokemon is immune to the effect of the Intimidate Ability.
This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch. This Pokemon is immune to the effect of the Intimidate Ability.
This Pokemon cannot be paralyzed. Gaining this Ability while paralyzed cures it.
This Pokemon cannot be poisoned. Gaining this Ability while poisoned cures it.
This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

This Pokemon cannot become affected by a non-volatile status condition or Yawn. If a Pokemon uses a Ghost-type attack against this Pokemon, that Pokemon's offensive stat is halved when calculating the damage to this Pokemon.
This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's Ability or attack, unless the attack knocks out this Pokemon. A Sticky Barb will be transferred to other Pokemon regardless of this Ability.

This Pokemon copies the Ability of an ally that faints. Abilities that cannot be copied are As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, and Zero to Hero.
This Pokemon damages those draining HP from it for as much as they would heal.
This Pokemon does not take damage from attacks made by its allies.
This Pokemon does not take recoil damage, except Struggle. Does not affect Life Orb damage or crash damage.
This Pokemon gains the Charge effect when it takes a hit from a wind move or when Tailwind begins on this Pokemon's side.
This Pokemon gains the Charge effect when it takes a hit from an attack.
This Pokemon has a 30% chance to move first in its priority bracket with attacking moves.
This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its non-volatile status condition cured at the end of each turn.
This Pokemon has a random stat, other than accuracy or evasiveness, raised by 2 stages and another stat lowered by 1 stage at the end of each turn.
This Pokemon has its non-volatile status condition cured at the end of each turn if Rain Dance is active. This effect is prevented if this Pokemon is holding a Utility Umbrella.
This Pokemon has its non-volatile status condition cured when it switches out.

This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's Attack, Special Attack, and accuracy stat stages when taking damage, and ignores other Pokemon's Defense, Special Defense, and evasiveness stat stages when dealing damage.
This Pokemon is considered to be asleep and cannot become affected by a non-volatile status condition or Yawn.

This Pokemon is immune to Electric-type moves and raises its Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by an Electric-type move. If this Pokemon is not the target of a single-target Electric-type move used by another Pokemon, this Pokemon redirects that move to itself if it is within the range of that move. If multiple Pokemon could redirect with this Ability, it goes to the one with the highest Speed, or in the case of a tie to the one that has had this Ability active longer.
This Pokemon is immune to Electric-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by an Electric-type move.
This Pokemon is immune to Fire-type moves and raises its Defense by 2 stages when hit by a Fire-type move.

This Pokemon is immune to Fire-type moves. The first time it is hit by a Fire-type move, its offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Fire-type attack as long as it remains active and has this Ability. If this Pokemon is frozen, it cannot be defrosted by Fire-type attacks.
This Pokemon is immune to Grass-type moves and raises its Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Grass-type move.

This Pokemon is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability. The effects of Gravity, Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball nullify the immunity. Thousand Arrows can hit this Pokemon as if it did not have this Ability.
This Pokemon is immune to Ground-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by a Ground-type move.
This Pokemon is immune to Status moves.

This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and raises its Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Water-type move. If this Pokemon is not the target of a single-target Water-type move used by another Pokemon, this Pokemon redirects that move to itself if it is within the range of that move. If multiple Pokemon could redirect with this Ability, it goes to the one with the highest Speed, or in the case of a tie to the one that has had this Ability active longer.

This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by a Water-type move. The power of Fire-type moves is multiplied by 1.25 when used on this Pokemon. At the end of each turn, this Pokemon restores 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, if the weather is Rain Dance, and loses 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, if the weather is Sunny Day. The weather effects are prevented if this Pokemon is holding a Utility Umbrella.
This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by a Water-type move.
This Pokemon is immune to bullet moves.
This Pokemon is immune to powder moves, damage from Sandstorm, and the effects of Rage Powder and the Effect Spore Ability.
This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, unless it used the move.
This Pokemon is immune to the effect of the Intimidate Ability and raises its Attack by 1 stage instead. This Pokemon cannot be forced to switch out by another Pokemon's attack or item.
This Pokemon is immune to wind moves and raises its Attack by 1 stage when hit by a wind move or when Tailwind begins on this Pokemon's side.
This Pokemon is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.

This Pokemon is unaffected by certain non-damaging moves directed at it and will instead use such moves against the original user. Moves reflected in this way are unable to be reflected again by this or Magic Coat's effect. Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes can only be reflected once per side, by the leftmost Pokemon under this or Magic Coat's effect. The Lightning Rod and Storm Drain Abilities redirect their respective moves before this Ability takes effect.
This Pokemon moves last among Pokemon using the same or greater priority moves.
This Pokemon receives 1/2 damage from contact moves, but double damage from Fire moves.
This Pokemon receives 1/2 damage from special attacks.
This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.
This Pokemon restores 1/3 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when it switches out.
This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.
This Pokemon's Attack is doubled.
This Pokemon's Attack is multiplied by 1.5 and the accuracy of its physical attacks is multiplied by 0.8.
This Pokemon's Attack is raised 1 stage after it is damaged by a Fire-type move. This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.
This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a Dark-type move.
This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and knocks out another Pokemon.
This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 2 stages for each of its stat stages that is lowered by an opposing Pokemon.
This Pokemon's Defense is doubled.
This Pokemon's Defense is raised 2 stages after it is damaged by a Water-type move.
This Pokemon's Defense is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a move.

This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves and have their power multiplied by 1.2. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, but before Ion Deluge and Electrify's effects.
This Pokemon's Special Attack is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and knocks out another Pokemon.
This Pokemon's Special Attack is raised by 1 stage when another Pokemon faints.
This Pokemon's Special Attack is raised by 2 stages for each of its stat stages that is lowered by an opposing Pokemon.
This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 1 stage at the end of each full turn it has been on the field.
This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 1 stage if hit by a Bug-, Dark-, or Ghost-type attack, or if an opposing Pokemon affected this Pokemon with the Intimidate Ability.
This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 6 stages after it is damaged by a Fire- or Water-type move.
This Pokemon's Status moves ignore certain Abilities of other Pokemon, and go last among Pokemon using the same or greater priority moves.
This Pokemon's allies have the power of their moves multiplied by 1.3. This affects Doom Desire and Future Sight, even if the user is not on the field.
This Pokemon's allies receive 3/4 damage from other Pokemon's attacks.
This Pokemon's attacks are critical hits if the target is poisoned.
This Pokemon's attacks do not make contact with the target.

This Pokemon's attacks have their power multiplied by 1.25 against targets of the same gender or multiplied by 0.75 against targets of the opposite gender. There is no modifier if either this Pokemon or the target is genderless.
This Pokemon's attacks that are not very effective on a target deal double damage.
This Pokemon's attacks with recoil or crash damage have their power multiplied by 1.2. Does not affect Struggle.

This Pokemon's attacks with secondary effects have their power multiplied by 1.3, but the secondary effects are removed. If a secondary effect was removed, it also removes the user's Life Orb recoil and Shell Bell recovery, and prevents the target's Anger Shell, Berserk, Color Change, Emergency Exit, Pickpocket, Wimp Out, Red Card, Eject Button, Kee Berry, and Maranga Berry from activating.
This Pokemon's attacks without a chance to make the target flinch gain a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
This Pokemon's bite-based attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.
This Pokemon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning. This effect comes after a move's inherent secondary effect chance.
This Pokemon's contact moves have their power multiplied by 1.3.
This Pokemon's contact moves ignore the target's protection, except Max Guard.
This Pokemon's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.
This Pokemon's evasiveness is doubled as long as it is confused.

This Pokemon's held item has no effect. This Pokemon cannot use Fling successfully. Macho Brace, Power Anklet, Power Band, Power Belt, Power Bracer, Power Lens, and Power Weight still have their effects.

This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore certain Abilities of other Pokemon. The Abilities that can be negated are Aroma Veil, Aura Break, Battle Armor, Big Pecks, Bulletproof, Clear Body, Contrary, Damp, Dazzling, Disguise, Dry Skin, Filter, Flash Fire, Flower Gift, Flower Veil, Fluffy, Friend Guard, Fur Coat, Grass Pelt, Heatproof, Heavy Metal, Hyper Cutter, Ice Face, Ice Scales, Immunity, Inner Focus, Insomnia, Keen Eye, Leaf Guard, Levitate, Light Metal, Lightning Rod, Limber, Magic Bounce, Magma Armor, Marvel Scale, Mirror Armor, Motor Drive, Multiscale, Oblivious, Overcoat, Own Tempo, Pastel Veil, Punk Rock, Queenly Majesty, Sand Veil, Sap Sipper, Shell Armor, Shield Dust, Simple, Snow Cloak, Solid Rock, Soundproof, Sticky Hold, Storm Drain, Sturdy, Suction Cups, Sweet Veil, Tangled Feet, Telepathy, Thick Fat, Unaware, Vital Spirit, Volt Absorb, Water Absorb, Water Bubble, Water Veil, White Smoke, Wonder Guard, and Wonder Skin. This affects every other Pokemon on the field, whether or not it is a target of this Pokemon's move, and whether or not their Ability is beneficial to this Pokemon.
This Pokemon's moves cannot be redirected to a different target by any effect.
This Pokemon's moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.3.

This Pokemon's moves have their power multiplied by 1+(X*0.1), where X is the total number of times any Pokemon has fainted on the user's side when this Ability became active, and X cannot be greater than 5.
This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled. This effect stacks with the Rainbow effect, except for secondary effects that cause the target to flinch.
This Pokemon's moves ignore substitutes and the opposing side's Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, Mist, and Aurora Veil.
This Pokemon's moves of 60 power or less have their power multiplied by 1.5, including Struggle. This effect comes after a move's effect changes its own power.
This Pokemon's moves that match one of its types have a same-type attack bonus (STAB) of 2 instead of 1.5.
This Pokemon's multi-hit attacks always hit the maximum number of times. Triple Kick and Triple Axel do not check accuracy for the second and third hits.

This Pokemon's non-damaging moves have their priority increased by 1. Opposing Dark-type Pokemon are immune to these moves, and any move called by these moves, if the resulting user of the move has this Ability.
This Pokemon's offensive stat is doubled against a target that switched in this turn.
This Pokemon's offensive stat is multiplied by 1.3 while using an Electric-type attack.
This Pokemon's offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Dragon-type attack.
This Pokemon's offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Rock-type attack.
This Pokemon's pulse moves have their power multiplied by 1.5. Heal Pulse restores 3/4 of a target's maximum HP, rounded half down.
This Pokemon's punch-based attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.
This Pokemon's sleep counter drops by 2 instead of 1.
This Pokemon's slicing moves have their power multiplied by 1.5.
This Pokemon's sound-based moves have their power multiplied by 1.3. This Pokemon takes halved damage from sound-based moves.

This Pokemon's type changes to match the type of the move it is about to use. This effect comes after all effects that change a move's type. This effect can only happen once per switch-in, and only if this Pokemon is not Terastallized.
This Pokemon's weight is doubled. This effect is calculated after the effect of Autotomize, and before the effect of Float Stone.

This Pokemon's weight is halved, rounded down to a tenth of a kilogram. This effect is calculated after the effect of Autotomize, and before the effect of Float Stone. A Pokemon's weight will not drop below 0.1 kg.
When an opposing Pokemon has a stat stage raised, this Pokemon copies the effect.
When one of this Pokemon's stat stages is raised or lowered, the amount is doubled.

When one of this Pokemon's stat stages would be lowered by another Pokemon, that Pokemon's stat stage is lowered instead. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon's stat stage was already -6. If the other Pokemon has a substitute, neither Pokemon has its stat stage lowered.

When this Pokemon eats certain Berries, the effects are doubled. Berries that restore HP or PP have the amount doubled, Berries that raise stat stages have the amount doubled, Berries that halve damage taken quarter it instead, and a Jaboca Berry or Rowap Berry has the attacker lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Bug-type attack.
When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Fire-type attack.
When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Grass-type attack.
When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Water-type attack.

When this Pokemon has more than 1/2 its maximum HP and takes damage from an attack bringing it to 1/2 or less of its maximum HP, its Attack, Special Attack, and Speed are raised by 1 stage, and its Defense and Special Defense are lowered by 1 stage. This effect applies after all hits from a multi-hit move. This effect is prevented if the move had a secondary effect removed by the Sheer Force Ability.

When this Pokemon has more than 1/2 its maximum HP and takes damage from an attack bringing it to 1/2 or less of its maximum HP, its Special Attack is raised by 1 stage. This effect applies after all hits from a multi-hit move. This effect is prevented if the move had a secondary effect removed by the Sheer Force Ability.
When this Pokemon is hit by an attack, the effect of Grassy Terrain begins.
When this Pokemon is hit by an attack, the effect of Sandstorm begins.
When this Pokemon is holding a Berry that usually activates with 1/4 or less of its maximum HP, it is eaten at 1/2 or less of its maximum HP instead.

When this Pokemon switches in, it appears as the last unfainted Pokemon in its party until it takes direct damage from another Pokemon's attack. This Pokemon's actual level and HP are displayed instead of those of the mimicked Pokemon.
While this Pokemon is active, Explosion, Mind Blown, Misty Explosion, Self-Destruct, and the Aftermath Ability are prevented from having an effect.
While this Pokemon is active, it prevents opposing Pokemon from using their Berries. This Ability activates before hazards and other Abilities take effect.
While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.
While this Pokemon is burned, the power of its special attacks is multiplied by 1.5.
While this Pokemon is poisoned, the power of its physical attacks is multiplied by 1.5.

shortDesc: (Mimikyu only) The first hit it takes is blocked, and it takes 1/8 HP damage instead.
30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be burned.
30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed.
30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned.
30% chance of infatuating Pokemon of the opposite gender if they make contact.
30% chance of poison/paralysis/sleep on others making contact with this Pokemon.
30% chance this Pokemon's ally has its status cured at the end of each turn.
Active Pokemon without this Ability have their Attack multiplied by 0.75.
Active Pokemon without this Ability have their Defense multiplied by 0.75.
Active Pokemon without this Ability have their Special Attack multiplied by 0.75.
Active Pokemon without this Ability have their Special Defense multiplied by 0.75.
After KOing a Pokemon: raises Attack, Sp. Atk, Speed by 1 stage. Once per battle.
After another Pokemon uses a dance move, this Pokemon uses the same move.
At 1/2 or less of this Pokemon's max HP: +1 Atk, Sp. Atk, Spe, and -1 Def, Sp. Def.
At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Bug attacks.
At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Fire attacks.
At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Grass attacks.
At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Water attacks.
Attack raised by 1 if hit by a wind move or Tailwind begins. Wind move immunity.
Boosts a random stat (except accuracy/evasion) +2 and another stat -1 every turn.
Combination of the Unnerve and Chilling Neigh Abilities.
Combination of the Unnerve and Grim Neigh Abilities.
Electric Terrain active or Booster Energy used: highest stat is 1.3x, or 1.5x if Speed.
Every move used by or against this Pokemon will always hit.
Fighting, Normal moves hit Ghost. Immune to Intimidate.
Fire-/Ice-type moves against this Pokemon deal damage with a halved offensive stat.
Ghost damage to this Pokemon dealt with a halved offensive stat; can't be statused.
If Eiscue, the first physical hit it takes deals 0 damage. Effect is restored in Snow.
If Electric Terrain is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
If Grassy Terrain is active, this Pokemon's Defense is multiplied by 1.5.
If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn.
If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled; immunity to Sandstorm.
If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x; immunity to Sandstorm.
If Snow is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn.
If Snow is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
If Snow is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x.
If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon cannot be statused and Rest will fail for it.
If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x; loses 1/8 max HP per turn.
If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
If a physical attack hits this Pokemon, Defense is lowered by 1, Speed is raised by 2.
If ally is Dondozo: this Pokemon cannot act or be hit, +2 to all Dondozo's stats.
If an active ally has this Ability or the Minus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.
If an active ally has this Ability or the Plus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.
If an ally uses its item, this Pokemon gives its item to that ally immediately.
If another Pokemon burns/poisons/paralyzes this Pokemon, it also gets that status.
If last item used is a Berry, 50% chance to restore it each end of turn. 100% in Sun.
If this Pokemon (not its substitute) takes a critical hit, its Attack is raised 12 stages.
If this Pokemon eats a Berry, it restores 1/3 of its max HP after the Berry's effect.
If this Pokemon eats a Berry, it will eat that Berry again at the end of the next turn.
If this Pokemon flinches, its Speed is raised by 1 stage.
If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Defense is multiplied by 1.5.
If this Pokemon has a stat stage raised it is lowered instead, and vice versa.
If this Pokemon has no item and is hit by a contact move, it steals the attacker's item.
If this Pokemon has no item, it finds one used by an adjacent Pokemon this turn.
If this Pokemon has no item, it steals the item off a Pokemon it hits with an attack.
If this Pokemon is KOed with a contact move, that move's user loses 1/4 its max HP.
If this Pokemon is a Palafin in Zero Form, switching out has it change to Hero Form.
If this Pokemon is an Arceus, its type changes to match its held Plate.
If this Pokemon is at full HP, damage taken from attacks is halved.
If this Pokemon is at full HP, it survives one hit with at least 1 HP. Immune to OHKO.
If this Pokemon is at full HP, its Flying-type moves have their priority increased by 1.
If this Pokemon is hit by a physical attack, Toxic Spikes are set on the opposing side.
If this Pokemon is hit by an attack, there is a 30% chance that move gets disabled.
If this Pokemon is statused, its Attack is 1.5x; ignores burn halving physical damage.
If this Pokemon is statused, its Speed is 1.5x; ignores Speed drop from paralysis.
If this Pokemon is the target of a foe's move, that move loses one additional PP.
If this Pokemon strikes with a critical hit, the damage is multiplied by 1.5.
If this Pokemon's stat stages would be lowered, the attacker's are lowered instead.
Immune to Intimidate. Intimidated: +1 Attack. Cannot be forced to switch out.
Making contact with this Pokemon has the attacker's Ability become Lingering Aroma.
Moves ignore substitutes and foe's Reflect/Light Screen/Safeguard/Mist/Aurora Veil.
No competitive use.
On switch-in, or when it can, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent foe's Ability.
On switch-in, summons Electric Terrain. During Electric Terrain, Sp. Atk is 1.3333x.
On switch-in, summons Sunny Day. During Sunny Day, Attack is 1.3333x.
On switch-in, this Pokemon Transforms into the opposing Pokemon that is facing it.
On switch-in, this Pokemon copies all of its ally's stat stage changes.
On switch-in, this Pokemon identifies the held items of all opposing Pokemon.
On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted to the foes' move with the highest power.
On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of opponents by 1 stage.
On switch-in, this Pokemon shudders if any foe has a supereffective or OHKO move.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Electric Terrain.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Grassy Terrain.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Psychic Terrain.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Rain Dance.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sandstorm.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Snow.
On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sunny Day.
On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.
On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage. Once per battle.
On switch-in, this Pokemon's Defense is raised by 1 stage. Once per battle.
On switch-in, this Pokemon's allies have their stat stages reset to 0.
Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Speed lowered by 1 stage.
Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their max HP.
Prevents Explosion/Mind Blown/Misty Explosion/Self-Destruct/Aftermath while active.
Prevents foes from choosing to switch unless they also have this Ability.
Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are airborne.
Prevents opposing Steel-type Pokemon from choosing to switch out.
Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Attack stat stage.
Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Defense stat stage.
Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.
Protects user/allies from Attract, Disable, Encore, Heal Block, Taunt, and Torment.
Speed is doubled on held item loss; boost is lost if it switches, gets new item/Ability.
Speed is raised 1 stage if hit by a Bug-, Dark-, or Ghost-type attack, or Intimidated.
Status moves with accuracy checks are 50% accurate when used on this Pokemon.
Sunny Day active or Booster Energy used: highest stat is 1.3x, or 1.5x if Speed.
The power of Fire-type attacks against this Pokemon is halved; burn damage halved.
This Pokemon and its allies are protected from opposing priority moves.
This Pokemon and its allies cannot fall asleep; those already asleep do not wake up.
This Pokemon and its allies' Steel-type moves have their power multiplied by 1.5.
This Pokemon appears as the last Pokemon in the party until it takes direct damage.
This Pokemon blocks certain Status moves and bounces them back to the user.
This Pokemon can poison or badly poison a Pokemon regardless of its typing.
This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.
This Pokemon cannot be confused. Immune to Intimidate.
This Pokemon cannot be frozen. Gaining this Ability while frozen cures it.
This Pokemon cannot be infatuated or taunted. Immune to Intimidate.
This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch. Immune to Intimidate.
This Pokemon cannot be paralyzed. Gaining this Ability while paralyzed cures it.
This Pokemon cannot be poisoned. Gaining this Ability while poisoned cures it.
This Pokemon cannot be statused, and is considered to be asleep.
This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.
This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.
This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's Ability or attack.
This Pokemon copies the Ability of an ally that faints.
This Pokemon damages those draining HP from it for as much as they would heal.
This Pokemon does not take damage from attacks made by its allies.
This Pokemon does not take recoil damage besides Struggle/Life Orb/crash damage.
This Pokemon draws Electric moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Electric immunity.
This Pokemon draws Water moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Water immunity.
This Pokemon eats Berries at 1/2 max HP or less instead of their usual 1/4 max HP.
This Pokemon gains the Charge effect when hit by a wind move or Tailwind begins.
This Pokemon gains the Charge effect when it takes a hit from an attack.
This Pokemon has a 30% chance to move first in its priority bracket with attacking moves.
This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its status cured at the end of each turn.
This Pokemon has its non-volatile status condition cured when it switches out.
This Pokemon has its status cured at the end of each turn if Rain Dance is active.
This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Electric moves; Electric immunity.
This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Ground moves; Ground immunity.
This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Water moves; Water immunity.
This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's stat stages when taking or doing damage.
This Pokemon is healed 1/4 by Water, 1/8 by Rain; is hurt 1.25x by Fire, 1/8 by Sun.
This Pokemon is healed by 1/8 of its max HP each turn when poisoned; no HP loss.
This Pokemon is immune to Ground; Gravity/Ingrain/Smack Down/Iron Ball nullify it.
This Pokemon is immune to Status moves.
This Pokemon is immune to bullet moves.
This Pokemon is immune to powder moves, Sandstorm damage, and Effect Spore.
This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, unless it used the move.
This Pokemon is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.
This Pokemon moves last among Pokemon using the same or greater priority moves.
This Pokemon receives 1/2 damage from sound moves. Its own have 1.3x power.
This Pokemon receives 1/2 damage from special attacks.
This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.
This Pokemon restores 1/3 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when it switches out.
This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.
This Pokemon takes 1/2 damage from contact moves, 2x damage from Fire moves.
This Pokemon's Attack is 1.5x and accuracy of its physical attacks is 0.8x.
This Pokemon's Attack is doubled.
This Pokemon's Attack is raised 1 stage if hit by a Grass move; Grass immunity.
This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a Dark-type move.
This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and KOes another Pokemon.
This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 when damaged by Fire moves; can't be burned.
This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 2 for each of its stats that is lowered by a foe.
This Pokemon's Defense is doubled.
This Pokemon's Defense is raised 2 stages after it is damaged by a Water-type move.
This Pokemon's Defense is raised 2 stages if hit by a Fire move; Fire immunity.
This Pokemon's Defense is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a move.
This Pokemon's Fire attacks do 1.5x damage if hit by one Fire move; Fire immunity.
This Pokemon's Ground/Rock/Steel attacks do 1.3x in Sandstorm; immunity to it.
This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Fairy type and have 1.2x power.
This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and KOes another Pokemon.
This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 1 when it reaches 1/2 or less of its max HP.
This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 2 for each of its stats that is lowered by a foe.
This Pokemon's Special Attack is raised by 1 stage when another Pokemon faints.
This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage at the end of each full turn on the field.
This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 6 stages after it is damaged by Fire/Water moves.
This Pokemon's Status moves go last in their priority bracket and ignore Abilities.
This Pokemon's Status moves have priority raised by 1, but Dark types are immune.
This Pokemon's accuracy can't be lowered by others; ignores their evasiveness stat.
This Pokemon's allies have the power of their moves multiplied by 1.3.
This Pokemon's allies receive 3/4 damage from other Pokemon's attacks.
This Pokemon's attacks are critical hits if the target is poisoned.
This Pokemon's attacks do 1.25x on same gender targets; 0.75x on opposite gender.
This Pokemon's attacks do not make contact with the target.
This Pokemon's attacks have 1.3x power if it is the last to move in a turn.
This Pokemon's attacks that are not very effective on a target deal double damage.
This Pokemon's attacks with recoil or crash damage have 1.2x power; not Struggle.
This Pokemon's attacks with secondary effects have 1.3x power; nullifies the effects.
This Pokemon's attacks without a chance to flinch gain a 10% chance to flinch.
This Pokemon's bite-based attacks have 1.5x power. Bug Bite is not boosted.
This Pokemon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning.
This Pokemon's contact moves have their power multiplied by 1.3.
This Pokemon's contact moves ignore the target's protection, except Max Guard.
This Pokemon's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.
This Pokemon's evasiveness is doubled as long as it is confused.
This Pokemon's held item has no effect, except Macho Brace. Fling cannot be used.
This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
This Pokemon's moves cannot be redirected to a different target by any effect.
This Pokemon's moves have 10% more power for each fainted ally, up to 5 allies.
This Pokemon's moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.3.
This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.
This Pokemon's moves of 60 power or less have 1.5x power, including Struggle.
This Pokemon's multi-hit attacks always hit the maximum number of times.
This Pokemon's offensive stat is doubled against a target that switched in this turn.
This Pokemon's offensive stat is multiplied by 1.3 while using an Electric-type attack.
This Pokemon's offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Dragon-type attack.
This Pokemon's offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Rock-type attack.
This Pokemon's pulse moves have 1.5x power. Heal Pulse heals 3/4 target's max HP.
This Pokemon's punch-based attacks have 1.2x power. Sucker Punch is not boosted.
This Pokemon's same-type attack bonus (STAB) is 2 instead of 1.5.
This Pokemon's sleep counter drops by 2 instead of 1.
This Pokemon's slicing moves have their power multiplied by 1.5.
This Pokemon's type changes to the type of the move it is using. Once per switch-in.
This Pokemon's weight is doubled.
This Pokemon's weight is halved.
This side's Grass types can't have stats lowered or status inflicted by other Pokemon.
When an opposing Pokemon has a stat stage raised, this Pokemon copies the effect.
When one of this Pokemon's stat stages is raised or lowered, the amount is doubled.
When this Pokemon eats certain Berries, the effects are doubled.
When this Pokemon is hit by an attack, the effect of Grassy Terrain begins.
When this Pokemon is hit by an attack, the effect of Sandstorm begins.
While this Pokemon is active, it prevents opposing Pokemon from using their Berries.
While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.
While this Pokemon is burned, its special attacks have 1.5x power.
While this Pokemon is poisoned, its physical attacks have 1.5x power.
